name: Luxuriated in cultural authenticity of East Java, Why not?
description:
Blitar is located in the southern part of East Java where
the founding father of Indonesia, Ir. Soekarno, came from. The trip offers the
unique exposure such as visiting historical sites and galleries, enjoying the
local street food which has been legendary for decades, learning the history of
Indonesia, greeting people and making short conversation with the local language and riding the
traditional transportation.
